getItem: select * from itemplace where cityid = coalesce(?, cityid) and CATETYPEID = coalesce(?, catetypeid) and CATEGORYID=  coalesce(?,categoryid) and typeid =  coalesce(?,typeid) and districtid =  coalesce(?,districtid)  and streetid =  coalesce(?,streetid) order by created desc  limit ?,15
getItemPlaceNearBy: select * from itemplace where address like CONCAT('%',?, '%') and CATETYPEID = coalesce(?, catetypeid) and CATEGORYID=  coalesce(?,categoryid) and typeid =  coalesce(?,typeid) and address like CONCAT('%',?, '%')  and address like CONCAT('%',?, '%') order by created desc  limit ?,13
updateUser: update user set username=?, firstname=?,lastname=? where id = ?
getReviewByItem: select * from review where itemid = ? limit 2
countUser: select id as c from user where email = ? and password=?
checkUser: select id as c from user where email = ?
updateLL: update itemplace set latitude = ?, logitude =? where id =?
itemFood: select * from itemfoods where cityid = coalesce(?, cityid) and CATETYPEID = coalesce(?, catetypeid) and CATEGORYID=  coalesce(?,categoryid) and typeid =  coalesce(?,typeid) and districtid =  coalesce(?,districtid)  and streetid =  coalesce(?,streetid) limit 15 offset ?
